description: Make this quick beef pho recipe for a speedy, warming and flavourful midweek meal.Â
name: Beef Pho Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 spring onions, peeled, chopped (save 3 sliced diagonally, to serve)
400g beef eye fillet steak, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large deep saucepan over medium heat. Add eschalot, ginger and garlic. Cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Pour stock and 3 cups of water into pan. Add star anise and cinnamon sticks. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and gently simmer for 20 minutes to infuse flavours. Remove solids with a slotted spoon and discard. Stir in fish sauce, lime juice and sugar.

Prepare noodles as per packet instructions. Divide noodles into 4 bowls. Top with steak, then ladle stock over noodles in order to 'cook' the meat. Serve with hoisin sauce, onion, Thai basil leaves, chilli and lime wedges.
